actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to confer jurisdiction in United States district courts to grant relief in certain cases involving military personnel where relief available to such personnel under military law or regulation is inadequate for the protection of the constitutional rights of such personnel.

summary.text: Confers jurisdiction on United States district courts to grant relief in cases involving personnel where the relief available to such personnel under military law or regulation is inadequate for the protection of the constitutional rights of such personnel.

titles.title: A bill to confer jurisdiction in United States district courts to grant relief in certain cases involving military personnel where relief available to such personnel under military law or regulation is inadequate for the protection of the constitutional rights of such personnel.
